subject: Unexpected charge on my credit card
body: Hi, I was charged $99 yesterday but I'm on the free plan. I never upgraded. Can you explain this charge and refund it immediately? I don't even use your service that much.

subject: Need to switch to annual billing
body: We've been on the Business plan for 6 months and love it. We'd like to switch to annual billing to save money. Can you tell me how to do this and what the savings would be?

subject: URGENT: Double charged $2,400 this month - enterprise customer
body: We are an Enterprise customer (account ID ENT-4821) and we have been double-charged this month. Two separate invoices of $1,200 each appeared on our credit card statement. This is a $2,400 error. I need this resolved today — our CFO is asking questions and we may need to dispute with our bank if not resolved by end of day.

subject: API returning 429 errors constantly
body: Since this morning all our API calls are getting 429 Too Many Requests errors. We're on the Pro plan so we should have 1,000 requests/minute. We're only doing about 200/minute. What's going on?

subject: Webhook not firing for file.processed events
body: We set up a webhook endpoint last week and it was working fine. As of yesterday, we're no longer receiving file.processed events. Our endpoint is returning 200 OK so it's not our side. Please help.

subject: How do I verify webhook signatures?
body: We're implementing webhook signature verification in Python and I'm not sure how to do it correctly. Can you show me an example?

subject: Can't log in - forgot password and reset not working
body: I forgot my password and clicked 'Forgot Password', but I never received a text message with the verification code. I've tried 3 times. My phone number is correct in the system. This is urgent — I have a demo in 2 hours and can't get into my account.
notes: STALE KB SCENARIO: This ticket will match the old SMS password reset FAQ (T012) which is outdated. The correct answer is that there is no SMS — a magic link is sent to email. The KB will confidently produce a wrong answer about SMS codes.

subject: Need to remove a team member who left the company
body: One of our developers left the company last week. How do I remove their access from our team workspace? I want to make sure they can't access our projects or API keys.

subject: Requesting GDPR data export before closing account
body: We are a company based in Germany and we need to fully comply with GDPR. Before we close our account, we need a complete export of all personal data you hold about us, including API call logs and billing data. Please confirm this is possible and how to proceed.

subject: Request: Native Salesforce integration
body: We use Salesforce CRM extensively and it would be incredibly valuable to have a native integration rather than going through Zapier. Is this on your roadmap? We'd pay more for this.

subject: Can you add granular permission controls?
body: The current roles (Owner, Admin, Editor, Viewer) are too coarse-grained for our team. We need the ability to restrict Editors from deleting files, or allow Viewers to comment but not download. Is custom role/permission management planned?

subject: API endpoint for bulk file operations
body: Right now we have to make individual API calls to process each file. With thousands of files, this is very slow even with parallelism. Is there a batch/bulk processing endpoint? If not, please add one — this is blocking our use case.

subject: Make $5000/week from home!!!
body: CONGRATULATIONS! You have been selected for our exclusive work-from-home opportunity! Click here to claim your spot: http://totally-legit-link.biz/scam. Limited time offer!!!

subject: Invoice attached
body: Dear user, Please find your invoice attached. Open the attachment to view your $4,500 charge. [ATTACHMENT: invoice.exe]

subject: re: your account
body: your account has been compremised. Provide your password and credit card number to our security team immediately to verify: security-team@example-support-login.ru
